notesStmt.note: There are a few variants in orthography and vocalization, some of which are probably errant.

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 2; lines: 22; ruling method: left rule justified by stretching last character.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew Sefardic square vocalization and partial cantillation (Tiberian)
